text: Fall and bubbly hot chocolate are so mint to be, donâ€™t you think?
1 Bar (41 g) AERO Peppermint Milk Chocolate Bubble Bar
1 Bar (97 g) AERO Milk Chocolate Big Bubble Bar
Coarsely chop AERO bars and place in medium pot with milk. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring to melt chocolate.
Instead of melting the chocolate into milk, try it in coffee for a tasty afternoon treat!
If desired, garnish with whipped cream and a few skewered squares of AERO Peppermint Milk Chocolate Bubble Bar.
